title: What are the best network virtualization technology to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: VMware NSX is the best network virtualization technology to learn Because After completing this VMware NSX certification, learners must be capable of understanding:Edge services gateway, logical route, Service Composer, Edge firewall, Role-based access control,and VLAN-to-VXLAN bridging. If you are considering to join this course so visit Koenig Solution, it is best training institute for getting knowledge about virtualization technology. The best part of the Institute is that they won a VMware Education Partner of the Year award 2015 and VMware Partner Executive Summit 2016 held in Mumbai.
